name: transport, freight, small lorry with refrigeration machine, EURO5, R134a refrigerant, cooling to generic market | transport, freight, lorry with refrigeration machine, cooling | Cutoff, U
description:
ecoQuery: https://ecoquery.ecoinvent.org/3.10/cutoff/dataset/14102/documentation

This is a linking activity which transfers part of the production volume of the transport, freight, lorry with refrigeration machine, 3.5-7.5 ton and 7.5-16 ton, EURO5, R134a refrigerant, cooling to the generic market for transport, freight, lorry with refrigeration machine, cooling.
category: H:Transportation and storage/49:Land transport and transport via pipelines/492:Other land transport/4923:Freight transport by road

processDocumentation.technologyDescription: The technology level of the linking activity is set to be the same as in case of the activity supplying the specific product.
